Kriging:
Tool: d8_flow_accumulation
Description: Calculates the flow accumulation using the D8 algorithm. Input must be a filled DEM.

Tool: extract_streams
Description: Extracts stream network using a flow accumulation threshold.
QGIS:
Tool: d8_flow_accumulation
Description: Calculates the flow accumulation using the D8 algorithm. Input must be a filled DEM.

Tool: extract_streams
Description: Extracts stream network using a flow accumulation threshold.
SmoothDEM:
Tool: d8_flow_accumulation
Description: Calculates the flow accumulation using the D8 algorithm. Input must be a filled DEM.

Tool: extract_streams
Description: Extracts stream network using a flow accumulation threshold.
WhiteboxTools:
Tool: clip_raster_to_polygon
Description: Clips a raster using a polygon boundary shapefile or GeoJSON.
